backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, tasks, study subjects, and assignments with access control and persistent state for upgrades.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old canister state to the new format by adding reminderTime to tasks and initializing studySubject fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/docs/task-completed-flash-integ: Guide explaining how the task completion flash animation is integrated into the Tasks UI and triggered after task completion.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file providing the main app container and loading the React entry script.
frontend/public/task-completed-flash/quo: Exports an array of Hindi inspirational quotes used by the task completion flash animation.
frontend/public/task-completed-flash/sni: Minimal standalone example showing how to integrate and trigger the task completion flash animation.
frontend/public/task-completed-flash/sta: Standalone demo page showing the task completion flash animation with a trigger button and keyboard shortcut.
frontend/public/task-completed-flash/tas: CSS definitions for the task completion flash overlay, glow effect, popup, icon, and responsive styles.
Vanilla JS component that initializes, displays, updates, and hides the task completion flash with random quotes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup configuring React Query, the router, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication state and actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Profile setup dialog allowing users to enter and save their name with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component that shows a login prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/landing/FeatureG: Grid of landing page feature cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/PrimaryB: Reusable styled primary button with size and class customization.
Simple layout wrapper that provides consistent section spacing and container width.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header with logo, route links, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout containing the header and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: UI component that checks browser notification support, requests permission, and displays prompts or alerts based on permission state.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskFor: Form for creating a new task with title input, error handling, and navigation after success or cancel.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskComple: Shows a temporary animated overlay with a random Hindi quote when a task is completed.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Renders active and completed tasks with controls for completion, deletion, and reminders plus a completion animation trigger.
frontend/src/constants/taskCompletedHind: Exports a large list of inspirational Hindi quotes used after task completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusMode.ts: Hook for reading and toggling a persistent focus-mode flag stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, status tracking, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderNotificati: Checks tasks periodically and triggers toast and browser notifications for due reminders, tracking fired reminders in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyZone.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching subjects and assignments and mutating subject or assignment data with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on tasks, setting or clearing reminders, and fetching the current user's profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark color palettes and base utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to nanoseconds, formatting reminder timestamps, and validating reminder input.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function wrapping clsx and tailwind-merge to combine class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/AddTaskPage.tsx: Protected page showing a form to create a new task and optionally prompting for profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/FocusModePage.tsx: Protected page for enabling focus mode and viewing notification permission status with explanatory info.
frontend/src/pages/StudySubjectDetailPag: Protected page to view a subject, manage its assignments, and perform related task actions.
frontend/src/pages/StudySubjectsPage.tsx: Authenticated page that lists study subjects and provides a form to create new ones with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Authenticated tasks dashboard that loads user tasks, handles errors/loading, and shows notification prompts.
frontend/src/pages/TaskZenLanding.tsx: Marketing landing page displaying hero content, features, and navigation to the main app.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route hierarchy for landing, tasks, study, and focus pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, shadows, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the current project scope, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records for the TaskZen app as it expands beyond a single-page landing into multi-module functionality. Captures design direction, required components, and upcoming modules such as Study Zone, Focus Mode, and reminders.
